reviews.text: Justin is an incredibly professional and knowledgeable chiropractor who helped alleviate my neck problem. During my consultation, he thoroughly assessed my condition and listened carefully to my concerns. He took the time to explain the treatment options available and tailored a plan that specifically addressed my needs. After just one session, I noticed a significant improvement in my neck pain and mobility. His expertise and attentive care made a real difference in my recovery. I highly recommend his services to anyone experiencing similar issues.

The TCM is clean and cozy. Micheal is very skillful, I had an hour treatment and immediately feel so relax after the treatment. Staff are nice and no hard sell at all. Will definitely come back again.

Justin gave me a great overall experience with bone setting. This is my first bone setting and can tell huge difference in my body alignment. He gave me advice on how to maintain good posture and exercises , sleeping pattern that is recommended for me. Staff the front desk is helpful and everything was smooth and fast.

Master Kenny’s bone-setting skills are truly exceptional. After sustaining lower spine pain from exercise, I was in urgent need of treatment for a quicker recovery. His skillful treatments provided remarkable relief in a short time. His approach is both gentle and highly effective, and his professionalism is evident in every session. If you’re looking for effective and trustworthy bone-setting, I highly recommend Master Kenny.

First time try TCM cos my back felt a bit off balance. My therapist is Michael, he very skillful and gentle, explained the cause clearly and answered all my questions. Really kind also. Amazingly, my back recovered in just one visit!

The service is 5 stars, price also reasonable, and no hard selling. Receptionist very friendly too. Will recommend to my friends and definitely come again!
